str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To say, declare. Properly, the same as the base of phos and phaino; to show or make known one's thoughts, i.e. Speak or say.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Bad, evil, in the widest sense. Apparently a primary word; worthless, i.e. depraved, or injurious.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To cry aloud, shriek. A primary verb; properly, to 'croak' or scream, i.e. to call aloud.
Greatly, exceedingly, abundantly, vehemently. Adverb from perissos; superabundantly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.
